official-title.#text: To prohibit the Secretary of Homeland Security from using Federal funds for the position of Public Advocate, or the position of Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach, within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement, and for other purposes.

cosponsor.#tail: ) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Public Advocate within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement

text.#text: Such Act prohibited funds made available by the Act from being used to provide funding for the position of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach

text.#text: Following the enactment of the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013, the former ICE Public Advocate continued to work at

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2013

text.#text: ICE activities now defined as “Community Outreach” are the very activities as those previously undertaken by the now-defunct Office of the Public Advocate. Such activities include the operation of a national hotline, the ICE Community and Detainee Helpline, which uses the same telephone number as a hotline used in the Office of the Public Advocate prior to the enactment of the
None of the funds made available by any Federal law may be used to provide funding for—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Public Advocate within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement
Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: the functions of which are substantially the same as those which—

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Public Advocate within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement

text.#text: as of March 26, 2013, were assigned to the position of

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Deputy Assistant Director of Custody Programs and Community Outreach within U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement
